info.name: 4chan Slideout, Floating postbox (4chanX 2.0)
info.description: Aerosynth made some changes to 4chan X quickreply, making style 45940 obsolete. This is for the newer versions. If you're sticking with the 4chan X 1.X versions, keep using style 45940.
info.additionalInfo:
ISSUES:
The spoiler image box still haunts my nightmares (WHY WON'T YOU ANIMATE LIKE ALL THE OTHER ELEMENTS)

Most (read: all) of those beautiful specificity rules are thrashed, meaning it may not work with all of the userstyles that style 44952 does.

I think you need "Persistent QR" activated in 4chan X options in order for this to work.

VERSIONS:
0.0 First release
0.5 Title text discrepancy fixed (Code scraped from user 62774's style 46162), Error text fixed.

Basic Code and conception, all that jazz: user 62774
